img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a player character is engaged in combat with a large, tiger-headed creature named "Tiger Vanguard." The setting is a rocky, barren landscape with sparse grass. The player character is wielding a weapon and appears to be in a defensive stance. Various icons and a health bar are visible on the screen, indicating gameplay mechanics such as health status and available actions. The interface suggests that the player can perform different actions using buttons labeled RT and LT.
